item.title: Finding the list of files Dreamweaver will reopen on startup
item.description: Want to make note of the files you had open in Dreamweaver? The listing of files is stored in the registry, depending upon your version.

item.title: Keyboard shortcuts for Visual Studio that mimic Dreamweaver
item.description: I've been using Dreamweaver so long that I really miss some keyboard shortcuts while using Visual Studio. [slnet0514:15f0c1c8-b0da-4398-8435-7fbd5f5b089b]

item.title: My first video to Google Video?
item.description: Place for comments regarding my first Google Video.

item.title: Installing Subversion and TortoiseSVN to a Windows XP, Home Edition, SP2, local machine with Dreamweaver 8
item.description: In this guide, I'll be installing Subversion and TortoiseSVN to a Windows XP machine, running SP2 and the Home Edition of XP. I'll be hooking it up to Dreamweaver 8, thanks to Nearly Geek's SVN4DW extension.

item.title: Dreamweaver 8 as a MXML IDE?
item.description: If only setting up code hints in Dreamweaver 8 were as easy as it looks ...

item.title: Compiling Flex applications with Dreamweaver
item.description: External link time: Tom Lee's post on easily compiling and running Flex applications using Dreamweaver.

item.title: Setting up Dreamweaver and Nvu to recognize your server
item.description: Now that we've setup Apache on our local computer, and effectively created a basic Web server, it's time to look at setting up some popular programs to work with these sites. I'll be looking at two programs, the costly Dreamweaver (8) and the free Nvu (1.0).

item.title: Free file comparision in Dreamweaver
item.description: WinMerge: for comparing local and remote files.
